dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So, a cruise ship that's completely banning single-use plastics—bottles, straws, the works. That's the Scarlet Lady for you.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a cruise ship that's completely banning single-use plastics-bottles, straws, the works. That's the Scarlet Lady for you.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Virgin Voyages, single-use plastics for passengers will be banned: beverage bottles, coffee cups, condiment packets, food packaging, shopping bags, stirrers and straws.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's adults-only too, which is uh, pretty bold for the cruise industry. 2,750 passengers, all 18 and up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's adults-only too, which is uh, pretty bold for the cruise industry. two thousand, seven hundred fifty passengers, all eighteen and up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently being built at the Fincantieri shipyard in Genoa, Italy, the adults-only, 2,700-passenger Scarlet Lady is expected to heighten the buzz about what a cruise can be.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And they're really pushing this "Modern Romance of Sailing" vibe. It's not your grandma's shuffleboard-and-buffet kind of trip.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And they're really pushing this Modern Romance of Sailing vibe. It's not your grandma's shuffleboard-and-buffet kind of trip.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Yet, celebrating sea life is central to Virgin Voyages DNA, as it aims to promote the Modern Romance of Sailing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. I mean, they've got this whole area called the B-Complex with like, state-of-the-art gym equipment overlooking the ocean. And sunrise yoga?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. I mean, they've got this whole area called the B-Complex with like, state-of-the-art gym equipment overlooking the ocean. And sunrise yoga?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The B-Complex will harbor Build, Burn, Bike and Balance areas with state-of-the-art exercise and gymnastics equipment overlooking the seascape. Complimentary group fitness classes will be aplenty, as well as sunrise and sunset yoga.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And sunset yoga! Plus boxing bags and a skating track. They're really leaning into that active, youthful energy Richard Branson's known for.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And sunset yoga! Plus boxing bags and a skating track. They're really leaning into that active, youthful energy Richard Branson's known for.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Get stronger via boxing bags, as well as the running and skating track.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Speaking of Branson, he called it "for the young at heart," which honestly sounds way more appealing than some of the older cruise lines.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Speaking of Branson, he called it for the young at heart, which honestly sounds way more appealing than some of the older cruise lines.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Says energetic billionaire Branson: Its for the young at heart.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're serious about female empowerment too—that Scarlet Squad program to mentor women in technical and marine roles? That's huge for an industry dominated by men.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're serious about female empowerment too-that Scarlet Squad program to mentor women in technical and marine roles? That's huge for an industry dominated by men.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Plans are afloat to promote a Scarlet Squad employee-development program, which will support, mentor and train women in key positions within the company, especially in jobs involving marine, hotel and technical management departments that have largely been men's cruise industry domain.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Tom McAlpin said they want to create an onboard environment that's fair and inclusive, which is a great step.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Tom McAlpin said they want to create an onboard environment that's fair and inclusive, which is a great step.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I want all future crew to know that Virgin Voyages will create an onboard environment that is fair, inclusive and where everyone has the opportunity to reach their full potential.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's the spa—Redemption, with hydrotherapy pools, mud rooms, even evening spa parties with DJs. Like, who does that on a ship?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's the spa-Redemption, with hydrotherapy pools, mud rooms, even evening spa parties with DJs. Like, who does that on a ship?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another interesting moniker has been fastened to the spa, called Redemption, which will indulge with a menu of massages plus a hydrotherapy pool, mud room, cold plunge pools, on-trend salt room and quartz beds. Expect evening spa parties to be enlivened with DJ music and delectable libations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And a barbershop just for guys called Stubble & Groom, which is such a Virgin branding move.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And a barbershop just for guys called Stubble and Groom, which is such a Virgin branding move.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pampering packages for men are formulated at the Stubble & Groom barbershop, as well as unisex manicures and pedicures at the Dry Dock salon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But back to the eco stuff—recycling wastewater into energy? That's next-level.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But back to the eco stuff-recycling wastewater into energy? That's next-level.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wastewater will be recycled and turned into energy whenever possible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: McAlpin said they want to create an "Epic Sea Change," not just get rid of straws. It feels like they're actually walking the talk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: McAlpin said they want to create an Epic Sea Change, not just get rid of straws. It feels like they're actually walking the talk.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Adds McAlpin, We believe that in order to fulfill our purpose of creating an Epic Sea Change for All, we must make a commitment that is bigger than just eliminating straws.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Sailing out of Tampa on seven-day Caribbean trips… I have to admit, I'm kinda tempted.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sailing out of Tampa on seven-day Caribbean trips... I have to admit, I'm kinda tempted.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The first of three planned Virgin Voyages ships, Scarlet Lady (strictly for those 18 years and older) will sail seven-day Caribbean itineraries from the port of Miami.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Same. Even if I never thought of myself as a "cruise person," this one might change my mind.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Same. Even if I never thought of myself as a cruise person, this one might change my mind.
